message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the value I place on it, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this product will truly benefit you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit far from $17,000. I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000.
